name: Tetroid (CodeChomper)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 42 in only 24 hours (had a late start) Even has Global High Score Board!  Can you get the top score?

Use WASD or Arrows to pilot your ship. Space bar to shoot falling blocks, "don't run out of space"

Hint: Bouncing off of things creates a 1 second cool down for your gun (try not to do that!)
